root.title: equatori equa sign pact contel unit
root.body: equatori commun co satellit datum network concern sai sign agreement contel corp ctc contel asc unit allow contel asc bui 3.6 mln share equatori stock 3.25 dlr per share addit equatori sai agreement contel asc bui minimum 10 mln dlr equip equatori loan equatori six mln dlr assum portion equatori right oblig satellit transpond leas
